articles.title: Ashwin's verdict on India's batting depth issue for WC as Dravid left concerned - Hindustan Times
articles.description: While the timing of the defeat left Dravid concerned with Asia Cup and World Cup around the corner, Ashwin delivered a major verdict on the conundrum. | Cricket
articles.content: One of the primary reasons behind India suffering a humiliating defeat to West Indies in the T20I series has been their batting depth. Throughout their five matches in the recently-concluded contest,… [+2887 chars]

articles.author: Lim Hui Jie
articles.title: Asia markets mixed as Japan GDP beats expectations - CNBC
articles.description: Japan saw its second quarter GDP rise by 6% on an annualized basis, while China will see its industrial output and retail sales figures for July.
articles.content:
Asia-Pacific markets were mixed on Tuesday ahead of key economic data out from China, which will release its industrial output and retail sales figures for July.
